&#3928;&#3954;&#3906;: [2085] ... 1) lta byed dang/ 'dren byed dam/ snang ba'i dbang po/ ... sha'i mig rnon po/ ... blo mig  ... zur mig  ... kha bas mig 'phyid pa/ ... mig g.yas g.yon 'phrig pa/ ... lta ba mig gis mi bzod pa/ ... 'grems ston khang nang la slebs dus mig gis lta tshod 'di tshod med pa/ ... ming gi rnam grangs la khyab byed dang/ mthong byed/ snang byed/ spyan/ tsak+Sha/ gzigs byed/ gsal byed/ lha'i sgron ma bcas so/ 2) i khung dang bu ga/ ... pang leb la mig 'bugs pa/ ... 3) (mngon) mig la g.yas g.yon gnyis yod pas grangs gnyis mtshon/ ...
mig gi dbang po/  mig gi khams/
